author: youyingli
body:
#### PR description:

Update new PDs to support the skim for 2023 data taking. The update follows the following:

- [CMSHLT-2596](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2596) : Split ```JetMET```, ```EGamma``` and ```Muon``` into 2 stream
- [CMSHLT-2707](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2707) : Move ```HLT_CscCluster``` and ```HLT_L1CSCShower_*``` triggers from ```DisplacedJet``` PD to ```Muon``` PD
- Disappearing Muon skim is added : https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/40666
- **Still waiting for LLP Jet skim added and its backport** 

Update the skim workflow to fit the 2023 skim config



#### PR validation:

N/A

title: Update autoSkim for 2023 data taking [13_1_X]
